name: The Lonely Ghost
description:
In the silent air of the old old big house, there floating the confusing little ghost.
He has no clue why he is there, thus keeps seeking...
Would you like to help this lonely little ghost to look for his past life?
The poor little ghost is waiting for your help!

Are you afraid of a ghost? Do you want to see a ghost?
What? ... a ghost can grow?
A ghost game combining "Breeding!", "Story!", "Collecting!", "Adventuring!" and "Being played by humans!" ~

Mysterious music softly played...
"I'm waiting for you to download, I'm waiting for you to download~
I’m thinking of your download, I’m thinking of your download... "
